abstract: Winning an active Shell drilling program is a potential boon for Ukraine, which is thought to be one of the best bets in Europe for so-called shale gas and tight gas.
snippet: Winning an active Shell drilling program is a potential boon for Ukraine, which is thought to be one of the best bets in Europe for so-called shale gas and tight gas.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — Royal Dutch Shell, the largest oil company in Europe, has signed a contract to drill for natural gas in Ukraine.

headline.main: Ukraine Signs Drilling Deal With Shell for Shale Gas
headline.print_headline: Royal Dutch Shell to Drill For Natural Gas in Ukraine
